医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球肺癌死亡人数下降，但危险因素仍然存在尽管从 1990 年到 2019 年，世界人口最多的 10 个国家的肺癌和相关癌症死亡人数有所下降，但这些积极的统计数据并没有涉及与烟草使用、空气污染和石棉接触相关的死亡率趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Lung-cancer-deaths-decrease-globally-but-risk-factors-still-persist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Lung-cancer-deaths-decrease-globally-but-risk-factors-still-persist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20c93b34-b81f-4bf3-9a04-e8e5a66ecc76 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 21:47:00 -0500 Lung cancer deaths decrease globally but risk factors still persist
2000万美元拨款用于探索病毒在人类健康中的作用十多年来，科学家们研究了微生物组、体内微生物的生存环境，以及它如何影响健康和疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/2420-million-grant-to-explore-the-role-of-viruses-in- human-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/2420-million-grant-to-explore-the-role-of-viruses-in- human-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=231b4c0d-a67b-4b3c-985f-dff9381d9693 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 21:41:24 -0500 $20 million grant to explore the role of viruses in human health
阿斯顿大学发起倡议解决药物引起的体重增加阿斯顿药学院的 Jo Howe 博士和 Ian Maidment 教授赢得了一个新项目的资助，该项目旨在开发新方法来减轻抗精神病药物引起的体重增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Aston-University-launches-initiative-to-tackle-medication-induced-weight-gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Aston-University-launches-initiative-to-tackle-medication-induced-weight-gain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=602c5c2d-8578-495b-b581-edb19338fdfa Thu, 09 Jan 2025 21:36:52 -0500 Aston University launches initiative to tackle medication-induced weight gain
英国生物银行发起全球最大的蛋白质组学研究英国生物银行今天宣布启动世界上最全面的针对我们体内循环的蛋白质的研究，这将改变疾病及其治疗的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Worlde28099s-largest-proteomics-study-launched-by-UK-Biobank.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Worlde28099s-largest-proteomics-study-launched-by-UK-Biobank.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6941b346-f309-491a-bdc5-61c66b1f7615 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 20:46:07 -0500 World’s largest proteomics study launched by UK Biobank
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：新年、新国会、新健康议程由共和党领导的新一届国会和当选总统唐纳德·特朗普制定了今年的重大立法计划，其中大部分不包括卫生政策。但健康可能会在更新减税、修改移民政策和改变贸易的努力中发挥重要的支持作用——哪怕只是为了帮助支付共和党的一些举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-New-Year-new-Congress-new-health-agenda.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-New-Year-new-Congress-new-health-agenda.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4db90f-506d-41f6-81d5-c90895039854 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 20:25:57 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': New Year, new Congress, new health agenda
人工智能聊天机器人能否掌握饮食平衡科学？了解人工智能聊天机器人如何以精确和多样化的方式重塑减肥计划，但在平衡常量营养素以实现最佳健康方面面临挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Can-AI-chatbots-master-the-science-of-dietary-balance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Can-AI-chatbots-master-the-science-of-dietary-balance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f2b172f-43d4-4d41-ba51-812bdd0d3651 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 18:02:00 -0500 Can AI chatbots master the science of dietary balance?
研究质疑阿片类药物使用障碍基因测试的准确性阿片类药物滥用，特别是阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 仍然是美国公共卫生的重大威胁，到 2022 年，超过 600 万 12 岁及以上的美国人符合 OUD 标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-questions-accuracy-of-genic-test-for-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-questions-accuracy-of-genic-test-for-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913a9edf-cfed-462c-bec7-b2fb4c6411f8 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 14:27:37 -0500 Study questions accuracy of genetic test for opioid use disorder
降钙素原测试未能缩短住院儿童的抗生素使用时间由利物浦大学领导的一项开创性的英国研究检查了一种称为降钙素原 (PCT) 的额外血液测试是否可以安全地缩短儿童在医院静脉注射 (IV) 抗生素的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Procalcitonin-test-fails-to-shorten-antibiotic-use-in-hospitalized-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Procalcitonin-test-fails-to-shorten-antibiotic-use-in-hospitalized-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d796​​89b-753e-4f62-b243-f0e26cda99e1 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 14:17:05 -0500 Procalcitonin test fails to shorten antibiotic use in hospitalized children
共病特应性疾病影响斑秃的预后哮喘、特应性皮炎或桥本甲状腺炎等伴随疾病是与圆形脱发（也称为斑秃 (AA)）预后不良相关的临床特征的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Comorbid-atopic-diseases-affect-prognosis-of-alopecia-areata.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Comorbid-atopic-diseases-affect-prognosis-of-alopecia-areata.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34eff692-bd40-461d-a07c-8ffb5e00dc9e Thu, 09 Jan 2025 14:09:00 -0500 Comorbid atopic diseases affect prognosis of alopecia areata
新抗生素显示出抗击结核病的希望包括慕尼黑大学医院热带研究所科学家在内的一个联盟已经证明了一种新型抗生素的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-antibiotic-shows-promise-in-fighting-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-antibiotic-shows-promise-in-fighting-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f44ab46-2c3c-4cc7-b0d9-66e921bd0400 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 14:03:00 -0500 New antibiotic shows promise in fighting tuberculosis
